description: A Windows Web development environment for Apache, MySQL, PHP databases
pre_install: Invoke-ExternalCommand "$dir\setup.exe" -RunAs -ContinueExitcodes @{1 = 'Click on the dialog box to proceed'} | Out-Null

uninstaller.script: Invoke-ExternalCommand "$dir\setup.exe" -ArgumentList '--mod=uninstall' -RunAs -ContinueExitcodes @{1 = 'Click on the dialog box to proceed'} | Out-Null

notes: The installer will ask for administrator privileges. If you want to use WampServer without administrator privileges, you can use the portable version.
